name: Circles & Shoots
description:
Just a small little bullet hell game I made for my school project, It's short but quite challenging. I played around with the idea of circles and so most of the game is made out of circles,

WARNING : I DO NOT OWN THE MUSIC USED, I WILL LIST THEM DOWN BELOW BUT IF THE CREATORS PREFER TO HAVE IT REMOVED I WILL DO SO ASAP!!
